meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels read 02274.5, simplifying to 2274.5. The red needle on the circular dial points precisely to the 3rd major mark after 0.00 (which corresponds to 0.03 m³). The angle is measured clockwise from the dial's 0 mark (indicated by '0,00' at approximately 290 degrees from 12 o'clock) to the needle tip (at approximately 175 degrees from 12 o'clock).
